data.question: Is the electrical conductivity of Ln4-MOFs dependent on the π–π stacking interaction?

data.answer: They enhance the stability of the conductive channels and improve conductivity

data.question: Was a field-effect transistor (FET) device successfully fabricated using Gd4-MOF?

data.answer: The large band gap of Gd4-MOF

data.question: What is the thermal stability limit of Tm4-MOF?

data.answer: It indicates the high stability of Gd4-MOF in strong oxidizing medium

data.question: What was the main carrier for high conductivity along the c-axis in Gd4-MOF?
data.answer: The π–π stacking arrangement facilitating efficient electron transport
